resources.string: To Begin Please say \n \"Create Reminder\" or\n \"Create Calendar Event\"
Step 1\nPlease say what you would\n like me to remind you of?
Step 2\nPlease say the date for this reminder(mm dd yy ex: \"12 23 20\")?
Step 3\nPlease say the time for this reminder(ex: \"Nine AM\" or "two thiry pm\" )?
Your reminder is set!\nYou can say \"next\" or \"exit\"
Please say a description of the event
Please say a title of this event
Where is this event taking place?
